name: Click and Trick
description:
Heyy, 

Click and Trick is a simple Clicker-type game in medieval, fantasy stile I made for the MayDay 1.0 jam. Eventhough the jam lasted 48 hours, I only worked on the project for about 24 hours due to school. I wrote all the code myself (with help of Brackeys, of course :)) and made the music on my own. I decided to use some of my assets, which I bought some time ago and they worked out great (models not made by me)!

I hope you enjoy playing and don't encounter many bugs, because my playtesting was very short :^)
